Question: What is likely to have a better school cafeteria?
Options: A. high school B. canteen C. polytechnic D. large room E. all kinds of schools

I think option E is likely to have a better school cafeteria. A good school cafeteria is essential for students to enjoy healthy and delicious food while studying. Some schools have their own canteens or cafeterias that provide students with healthy and tasty food. Other schools may have to rely on outside caterers or fast food chains for their food service. In some cases, a larger room may be used for catering services, but it may not provide the same level of service and quality of food as a dedicated cafeteria. Polytechnic schools typically provide quality food and service in their cafeterias. However, not all schools provide a good cafeteria. Therefore, option E includes all kinds of schools, which provides a broader comparison.
